member.name: P:R2API.OrbAPI.Loaded
member.summary: Return true if the submodule is loaded.

member.name: M:R2API.OrbAPI.AddOrb(System.Type)
member.summary: Adds an Orb to the orb catalog. This must be called during plugin Awake() or OnEnable(). The type must be a subclass of RoR2.Orbs.Orb
member.param: The type of the orb being added
member.returns: True if orb will be added

member.name: M:R2API.OrbAPI.AddOrb``1
member.summary: Adds an Orb to the orb catalog. This must be called during pplpugin Awake() or OnEnable() The type of must be a subclass of RoR2.Orbs.Orb
member.typeparam: The Type of orb being added
member.returns: True if the orb will be added

member.name: F:R2API.OrbAPI.PluginVersion
member.summary: Version of the plugin, should be matching with the thunderstore package.

member.name: T:R2API.AutoVersionGen.AutoVersionAttribute
member.summary: Add a PluginVersion field to the attribut-ed class filled from the thunderstore.toml versionNumber field
